tools.name: list_all_devices
tools.description: Get a list of all Eufy Security devices (cameras, doorbells, sensors, etc.) in the account

returns.description: List of devices with their details

use_cases: User asks 'What cameras do I have?'
User asks 'Show me all my Eufy devices'
User wants to see device status

tools.name: get_device_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Eufy Security device by its serial number

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The unique serial number of the device

use_cases: User asks 'Tell me about my front door camera'
User asks 'What's the status of device T8600...'

tools.name: refresh_devices
tools.description: Refresh the device list from Eufy cloud to get the latest device information and status

returns.description: Refresh status with device and station counts

use_cases: User says 'I just added a new camera, can you see it?'

tools.name: list_all_stations
tools.description: Get a list of all Eufy Security stations/hubs (HomeBase) that manage the devices

returns.description: List of stations with their details and connected devices

use_cases: User asks 'What stations do I have?'

tools.name: get_station_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific station including its guard mode, connected devices, and network status

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The unique serial number of the station

returns.description: Detailed station information including guard mode and devices

use_cases: User asks 'What's my security system status?'
User asks 'What mode is my HomeBase in?'

tools.name: set_guard_mode
tools.description: Change the security guard mode for a station. Modes: Away (full security), Home (partial security), Disarmed (security off), Schedule (automatic), Custom1/2/3
use_cases: User says 'I'm leaving, set to away mode'

examples.user_request: I'm home, switch to home mode

tools.name: start_livestream
tools.description: Start a live video stream from a camera or doorbell device. The stream will be available through the device's connection.

parameters.name: deviceSerial
parameters.description: The serial number of the camera/doorbell device

use_cases: User says 'Show me my front door camera'
User says 'Start livestream from camera X'
User wants to view live video
Checking what's happening at a location
notes: Livestream events will be sent via SignalR hub
Stream metadata includes video codec, resolution, and FPS

tools.name: stop_livestream
tools.description: Stop an active live video stream from a camera or doorbell device

parameters.name: deviceSerial
parameters.description: The serial number of the camera/doorbell device

tools.name: connect_to_station
tools.description: Establish a P2P (peer-to-peer) connection to a station for direct local or remote communication
notes: Required before livestream or some device commands

events.name: DeviceAdded
events.description: Fired when a new device is discovered or added to the account
use_cases: Notify user when new device is detected
Trigger automation when device is added

events.name: StationAdded
events.description: Fired when a new station/hub is discovered or added
use_cases: Notify when new station is set up

events.name: PushNotification
events.description: Real-time notification from Eufy devices for motion, person detection, doorbell rings, etc.
use_cases: Alert user 'Someone is at your front door'

examples.response: Someone is ringing your front doorbell
Motion detected by Front Yard Camera
Person detected at Back Door Camera

events.name: LivestreamStarted
events.description: Fired when a livestream begins from a device

steps.description: Get all stations and their guard modes
Get all devices and their status

common_workflows.name: arm_system_when_leaving
common_workflows.description: Arm security system when leaving home

steps.description: Set each station to Away mode

common_workflows.name: disarm_when_arriving
common_workflows.description: Disarm security system when arriving home

steps.description: Set each station to Home mode

common_workflows.name: view_specific_camera
common_workflows.description: Start livestream from a specific camera

steps.description: Find camera by name or location

user_requests: Let me see the backyard camera
